Large/iterative authentication requests.Action: Collect failed authentication logs (Windows Event ID 4625) and Zeek conn.log for public-facing services. Group logs by source IP and destination service. Calculate the number of failed attempts per source IP per unit of time. Identify IPs with a high rate of failed attempts or iterative attempts against multiple user accounts/emails. Use correlation analysis to link failed attempts across different public services from the same source.

Unusual external network traffic pattern.Action: Monitor Zeek conn.log for external traffic targeting public-facing web servers. Analyze patterns in connection volume and request frequency from source IPs. Identify IPs exhibiting high connection volumes or request rates inconsistent with normal user browsing (e.g., using descriptive statistics, IQR, or time series analysis on connection/request rates per source IP).
